channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Live PD: Police Patrol
channel.desc: A shoplifter in South Carolina, a dispute with a gun in Texas and a drug bust in Arizona.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Live PD: Greatest Shifts
channel.desc: In Indiana, a Santa lookalike gets caught dashing a little too quickly; in Florida, officers give a lesson in how not to obstruct justice; in California, d?j? vu strikes when a repeat suspect is caught twice in the same day.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Live PD: Greatest Shifts
channel.desc: In Bradford County, police respond to an alcohol-fueled knife fight; in Tallahassee, a drunken clash erupts over stolen chicken tenders; in Pomona, police breach a suspected illegal gambling site.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Live PD: Greatest Shifts
channel.desc: In Pomona, police search a suspected gang member's home. In Tulsa, they serve an arrest warrant and uncover weapons and narcotics. Later, police respond to a report of armed robbery and find an intoxicated man with a PVC pipe.
